definition: A designated area where construction or building work is taking place, often marked by barriers or signs, typically causing temporary disruptions or delays in traffic or pedestrian movement. It is commonly used to refer to a construction site or roadworks.

examples.german: Die Baustelle wird bald fertig sein.
examples.english: The construction site will be finished soon.
The construction site is well secured.
The construction site is obstructing the traffic.
